title: Walmart Is Secretly Having An Epic Beauty Sale Right Now
text:
ICYMI: Walmart has a sick a beauty section.

I'll admit Walmart isn't the first place I think of when I need to restock my makeup bag. It's the perfect place to purchase new razors or deodorant, but fragrance? Turns out, yes.

Walmart's Premium Beauty section features brands like Clinique, Living Proof, Dermalogica, and Tom Ford Beauty. (Really.) They regularly offer impressive discounts on perfumes, cleansers, mascara, and so much more. Not only can you buy your favorite cosmetics on the cheap, but you can also take advantage of Walmart's expedited shipping and have your order delivered in no time.

This beauty goldmine is basically Walmart's best-kept secret—and there's a pretty big sale going on this weekend. Check out the 10 deals below and prepare to be pumped.
